amendment.description: An amendment numbered 38 printed in House Report 114-359 to direct the Secretary of Energy to study weaknesses in the security architecture of certain smart meters currently available.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 38 printed in House Report 114-359 to direct the Secretary of Energy to study weaknesses in the security architecture of certain smart meters currently available.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norcross amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norcross amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Norcross.
